de.htwg.go.model

Interface IGameField

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameField

    public interface IGameField
    Represents the Gamefield of the Game. Provides serveral methods for the general game functionality

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      returns if a cell at x,y is already checked
